imoCompendium.$comment: Version: FAL.5/Circ. 55- IMO Compendium as approved by FAL 49 in 2025

imoNumber.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0140 | description: The ship identification number shown on its IMO ship's certificate.

shipName.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0142 | description: The ship's name shown on the IMO ship's certificates.

draughtOverall.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0357 | description: Maximum ship present static draught in meters and centimeters. | Unit: metres

draughtForward.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0621 | description: The vertical distance in metres between the waterline and the bottom of the hull, with the thickness of the hull included from forward. | Unit: metres

draughtAft.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0622 | description: The vertical distance in metres between the waterline and the bottom of the hull, with the thickness of the hull included from aft. | Unit: metres

arrivalPortCode.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0108 | description: A code representing the port where the ship arrives.

departurePortCode.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0112 | description: A name and country of the port from which the ship departs.

arrivalActual.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0063 | description: The date and time the ship arrives at a specified location, ATA.

arrivalEstimated.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0064 | description: The date and time the ship is estimated to arrive at a specified location, ETA.

shipTrueHeading.description: imoDataNumber: IMO0620 | description: The direction in which the ship is pointing with respect to true north, expressed in degrees.
